general.description: Bolero is one of the Empire's most successful planets. The population is prosperous and growing, and the planet's conditions are mild. Although it is still treated as something of a backwater, it is becoming increasingly important in Imperial politics.
general.bar: The bar here is styled as an old-Earth pub, with a low ceiling, warm beer, and good food. The clients are all polite and cheerful. Not surprisingly, given the bouncers standing by the walls.
